hero-subtitle: Nhungamiro yedzidzo mune zveEthereum. Dzidza pamusoro pekushanda kweEthereum uye kuti ungabatanidzwa nayo sei. Peji rino rinosanganisira zvinyorwa zvakareruka uye zvakadzama, makwara ekudzidzisa uye zvishandiswa.
what-is-crypto-1: Ungadaro wakanzwa pamusoro pemacryptocurrencies, blockchains uye Bitcoin. Hochekoche dziri pazasi dzichakubatsira kudzidza pamusoro peizvi uye kuti zvinodyidzana sei neEthereum.
what-is-crypto-2: MaCryptocurrencies, akafanana nebitcoin anobvumira ani naani zvake kutumira mari pasi rese. Ethereum inokwanisawo kuita saizvozvo, asi inokwanisa kutekenya zvirairwa zvemichina zvinotendera kuti vanhu vagadzire zvishandiswa uye masangano. Dandemutande iri rakasimba uye rakatepuka: chirairwa chemuchina chemhando yese yese chinokwanisa kutekenywa paEthereum. Dzidza zvakawanda uwane kuti ungatanga sei:
what-is-ethereum-card-description: Kana uri mutsva, tangira pano kudzidza kuti sei Ethereum yakakosha.
what-is-ethereum-card-image-alt: Mufananidzo wemunhu akatarisa bazaar, zvichimirira Ethereum.
what-is-eth-description: Ether (ETH) ndiyo mari inoshandiswa panetiweki nepamaapu eEthereum.
what-is-web3-card-description: Web3 hurongwa hutsva hweindaneti hunokoshesa mvumo dzehupfumi nehudungamunhu hwako.
guides-hub-desc: Nhungamiro: nhanho nenhanho dzemirayiro pamusoro pekushandisa Ethereum
how-do-i-use-ethereum-1: Kushandisa Ethereum zvinogona kureva zvizhinji kuvanhu vazhinji. Zvichida ungada kupinda muchishandiswa, kusimbisa rupawo rwako, kana kutumira ETH. Chekutanga chauchada chikwama. Nzira iri nyore kugadzira nekushandisa sofutiweya inonzi chikwama.
what-is-a-wallet-card-description: Zvikwama zvepaindaneti zvakafanana nezvikwama chaizvo; zvinochengeta zvaunoda kuti uratidze humunhu hwako uye kuti uwane mvumo kupinda munzvimbo dzaunokoshesa.
find-a-wallet-card-description: Tsvaga pamusoro pezvikwama uchishandisa zvakatsarukana zvakakukoshera.
crypto-security-basics-card-description: Dzidza kucherechedza chitsotsi uye kuti unganzvenga manomano akatekeshera.
things-to-consider-banner-1: Kutsinhanisa kwega kwega kwepaEthereum kunoda mubhadharo weETH, kusanganisira nyangwe uchida kufambisa matokens akasiyana akagadzirirwa paEthereum akafanana neUSDC kana DAI.
things-to-consider-banner-2: Mubhadharo wekufambisa kutsinhanisa unogona kukwira mudenga zvichienderana nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kuedza kushandisa Ethereum, naizvozvo tinokurudzira kushandisa
what-is-ethereum-used-for-1: Ethereum yatungamira kugadzirwa kwezvishandiswa nemasevhisi matsva zvinokwanisa kuvandudza zvikamu zvakasiyana-siyana zveupenyu hwedu. Tichiri mumavambo ebasa iri asi kune zvizhinji zvekufara pamusoro pazvo.
defi-card-description: Tsvakurudza pamusoro pehurongwa hwezvemari hwakasiyana hwakavakwa pasina mabhanga uye hunokwanisa kushandiswa naani zvake.
stablecoins-card-description: Macryptocurrencies akaenzaniswa nekuoshwa hweimwe mari, zviwanikwa kana chimwe chishandiswa chinomiririra zvemari.
nft-card-description: Kumiririra mvumo dzemuridzi hwezvinhu zvakasananguka, kubva kune zvekuratidzira humhizha kusvikira magwaro anoratidza mwene wezvinhu kusvikira kumatikiti ema concert.
dao-card-description: Tendera nzira itsva dzekushandidzana pasina mukuru webasa.
dapp-card-description: Vaka hurongwa hweupfumi hwepamakombiyuta hunoshandisika pakati nepakati pevanhu.
emerging-use-cases-description: Pane imwe misika yakakurumbira iri kugadzirwa kana kuvandudzwa neEthereum:
strengthening-the-ethereum-network-descr: Unokwanisa kubatsira kuchengetedza Ethereum uye uchiwana mubairo panguva imwe chete kuburikidza nekuisa mukando weETH yako. Pane nzira zvakawanda dzekuisa mukando zvichienderana neudzamu hweruzivo rwako uye kuti une ETH yakawanda sei.
staking-ethereum-card-description: Dzidza kuti ungaita mukando wako weETH sei.
run-a-node-card-description: Ita chikamu chakakosha mudandemutande reEthereum nekugadzira muchina wehumabharani.
learn-about-ethereum-protocol-descriptio: Zvevashandisi vanofarira zviri tekinikari zvenetiweki yeEthereum.
energy-consumption-card-button: Ethereum inoshandisa simba nenzira inochengetedza nyika here?
ethereum-upgrades-card-description: Gwara reEthereum rinoita kuti ikwanise kukura, yakachengetedzeka uye ichikwanisa kuramba ichienderera mberi.
ethereum-whitepaper-card-description: Pfungwa dzepamavambo dzezveEthereum dzakanyorwa naVitalik Buterin muna 2014.
more-on-ethereum-protocol-consensus: Kushanda kwebvumirano inoitwa nehumbowo hwemukando muEthereum
ethereum-community-description: Kubudirira kweEthereum kunobva muboka redu rakazvipira kwazvo. Zviuru zvevanhu vane chido uye vanosundwa zvinobatsira kufambisa muono weEthereum mberi, uye vachipa chengetedzo kudandemutande kuburikidza nemikando nezvehurumende. Huyai tibatane!
community-hub-card-description: Nharaunda yedu inosanganisira vanhu vanobva kwakasiyana siyana uye kwese kwese.
community-hub-card-alt: Mufananidzo wevavaki vari kushanda pamwe chete.
get-involved-card-description: Wakasununguka (hongu iwe!) kupa nekuzivisa zvingabatsira nharaunda yeEthereum.
online-communities-card-description: Mapoka epaindaneti anopa mukana mukuru wekubvunza mibvunzo yakanyatsonanga kana kuti ungatanga sei.
mastering-ethereum-description: Zvita 23, 2018 â€“ Andreas M. Antonopoulos, Gavin Wood Ph.D.
zeroknowledge-description: Tinopinda zvakati dzamei muhuchenjeri huchasimudzira dandemutande rakapatsanuka riri kukura neboka riri kuvaka dandmutande iri
green-pill-description: Tinopenengura hurongwa hwezvehupfumi nemari dzedandemutande zvinogadzira mhedzisiro dzakanakira pasi rese
unchained-description: Tinodzika zvakadzama muvanhu vari kuvaka dandemutande rakapatsanurwa, zvizhinji zvehuchenjeri neukomba hunogona kugadzira hwaro hweramangwana redu uye imwe yemisoro yenyaya yakaoma mumari dzedandemutande, dzakaita sezvemitemo, chengetedzo uye kuzvivanza
the-daily-gwei-description: Pfupiso dzenhau, zvavandudzwa neongororo pamusoro peEthereum
